iopair.name: C-C191A-SUBV-07-ST01-DT06-DF08-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Reads in a size to use for a malloc. The size subtracts 10 before being used, which results in an integer underflow and an attempt at allocating a very large chunk of memory
